ModuleDescription:
The Starter Workshops are part of the Career Creation suite of training programmes designed to impart year 1 undergraduates with the core skills needed to prepare for their careers. The workshops take students through early and in-depth career planning and train them in the concrete skills necessary for their eventual internship and job search. The Starter Workshops comprise of the following:
1. Career Planning – How to Create Your Future
2. Personal Branding – How the World Knows You
3. Networking – How to Build Your Tribe
4. Resume Crafting – How to Impress on Paper
5. Interviewing – How to Showcase Yourself
